topic.title: Checking for New Versions

body.p:
offers the option of checking for new versions
the option of checking for new versions at the http://www.oxygenxml.com http://www.oxygenxml.com/diff http://www.syncrosvnClient.com site when the application is started. If this option is enabled a message dialog will notify the user when new versions are released.
To check for new versions manually, at any time, go to Help Check for New Versions .
